sentences.en: Annan bristled at the criticisms, which he called politically biased and ideologically inspired.
sentences.cn: 他说,这些指责是政治歧视,是受到意识形态的支配.

sentences.en: But like all the most successful illicit traders, China is ideologically profligate in its relations.
sentences.cn: 就像那些成功的违法交易以一样, 中国正在享受这种关系带来的好处.

sentences.en: However along its long European and African Frontier the Bourbon Kingdom faces ideologically hostile neighbours.
sentences.cn: 然而,漫长的欧洲和北非边境线上,王国却必须随时面对意识形态上抱有强烈敌意的邻国.

sentences.en: Ideologically, he would not shift his ground.
sentences.cn: 他的思想立场不会改变.

sentences.en: Ideologically, there was nothing in common between them.
sentences.cn: 他们在思想观念上格格不入。
在思想意识上, 他们之间有许多不同之处.

sentences.en: Ideologically, we do not see eye to eye.
sentences.cn: 在意识形态方面, 我们意见不一致.

sentences.en: More often, I am a student ideologically specialized treatment of small illnesses and incurable diseases doctor.
sentences.cn: 更多的时候, 我是一位专门诊治学生思想上的小毛病以及疑难杂症的医生.

sentences.en: The method of correction is primarily to strengthen education so as to rectify individualism ideologically.
sentences.cn: 纠正的方法:主要是加强教育,从思想上纠正个人主义.

sentences.en: This is thought to explain in part and survival of ideologically fueled rumors.
sentences.cn: 这部分解释了从观念形态上助长谣言的原因.

words.tran_cn: 意识形态；思想意识；观念学

trans.tran_cn: 思想体系上，意识形态上
trans.tran_en: In a way that relates to ideas or an ideology, especially of a political or economic nature.
